# moco-input



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute     | Description                                        | Type      | Default     |
| ------------- | ------------- | -------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `dark`        | `dark`        | style of the button (dark) or not                  | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `error`       | `error`       | is error or not                                    | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `label`       | `label`       | field label text                                   | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `placeholder` | `placeholder` | placeholder text                                   | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `value`       | `value`       | value of the input field,  updated on input change | `string`  | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event         | Description                                                      | Type                  |
| ------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------- |
| `inputchange` | emits the value of input plus updates the value of the component | `CustomEvent<string>` |
